#include <cstdio>
#include <numeric>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <map>
#include <cmath>
#include <ctime>
#include <algorithm>
#include <bitset>
#include <queue>
#include <sstream>
#include <deque>
#include <cassert>
#include<iomanip>
#include <stack>
#include <list>


using namespace std;

#define mp make_pair


#define gc getchar_unlocked


using namespace std;

typedef uint64_t ll;


pair<int, pair<int, int> > extendedEuclid(int a, int b) {
    if(a == 0) return make_pair(b, make_pair(0, 1));
    pair<int, pair<int, int> > p;
    p = extendedEuclid(b % a, a);
    return make_pair(p.first, make_pair(p.second.second - p.second.first*(b/a), p.second.first));
}

int modInverse(int a, int m) {
    return (extendedEuclid(a,m).second.first + m) % m;
}



int main() {

    int tc;
    cin>>tc;
    
    while(tc--){
    
    int n,m,s,p,q;
    
    cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
    
    int lr = n-m+1, lp = m-1;
    
    int stv = 1, str = 1;
    int cnt = 1, ans = 0;
    
    bool cr = false, cv = false;
    
    while(cnt<=s){
        
       stv = stv+p;
        if(stv>lp && !cv){stv = (stv-lp -1)%lr + m;cv=1;}
       else if(cv) stv = (stv-m)%lr + m;
        
        str = str+q;
        if(str>lp && !cr){str = (str-lp -1)%lr + m; cr=1;}
        else if(cr) str = (str-m)%lr + m;
        
        
        if(stv==str)ans++;
        cnt++;
    }
    
    
    cout<<ans<<endl;;
    
    

}

}


/*
 10 4 10 12 2


 
 */
